amendment.description: Amendment transfers $1 million out of the Corps of Engineers' expense account into the Corps of Engineers' construction account for coastal restoration purposes.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase the Corps of Engineers-Civil-Construction account for the purpose of coastal restoration by $1 million and reduce the Corps of Engineers-Civil-Expenses account by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Scalise amendment (A064) Agreed to by recorded vote: 271 - 148 (Roll no. 590).
